This game is so trash that it made me ignore my sister for 80 years which made her develop a serious meth addiction. The addiction and use of other drugs caused her imminent death. She was found three days ago in a dumpster with two shots in her genital area.

10/10 game would suck dick for AWP-Asiimov.

Don't even think of buying this game. Cheaters are in almost every single game, valve doesn't even care. They do actually care because they want cheaters to play the game in order to get banned and buy a new copy of CS:GO (so clever). 

If you find a cheater into a competitive match, you have wait for the whole 45 minutes game to be completed and waste your time, otherwise you will get banned for 1 week or more. By the way, sure thing is you are going to lose since the enemy team have a cheater so you will also get deranked. 

Even Fortnite, a free-to-play game has 0 cheaters, try it yourself.
